ingredients.raw: For the Beans:
1 pound (454 g) dried Great Northern white beans or Cannellini white beans, picked off any debris and rinsed

expected.item: dried Great Northern white beans or Cannellini white beans
expected.note: picked off any debris and rinsed

ingredients.raw: 3 tablespoons (36 g) Diamond Crystal kosher salt; for table salt, use about half as much by volume or the same weight

expected.item: Diamond Crystal kosher salt; for table salt, use about half as much by volume or the same weight

ingredients.raw: 1 3/4 teaspoons (10 g) baking soda
For the Stew:
3 tablespoons (45 ml) olive oil, plus more for serving
1 large yellow onion (10 ounces; 285 g), chopped
3 cloves garlic (15 g), minced
2 1/2 tablespoons tomato paste
1 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin
1 1/2 teaspoon sweet paprika
1 teaspoon ground turmeric
1 teaspoon ground ginger
4 teaspoons Diamond Crystal kosher salt; for table salt use half as much by volume

expected.item: Diamond Crystal kosher salt; for table salt use half as much by volume

ingredients.raw: 1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
1 1/4 pounds (567 g) boneless lamb stew meat (lamb neck, leg, or shoulder, or a combination),trimmed of excess fat and cut into 2- to 3-inch pieces

expected.item: boneless lamb stew meat (lamb neck, leg, or shoulder, or a combination)
expected.note: trimmed of excess fat and cut into 2- to 3-inch pieces

ingredients.raw: Drained brined white beans from above

expected.item: Drained brined white beans from above

ingredients.raw: 2 large tomatoes (about 10 ounces; 285 g), halved and grated on the large holes of a box grater, with their juices (alternatively use 7 ounces canned chopped tomatoes)

expected.item: tomatoes, halved and grated on the large holes of a box grater, with their juices
expected.note: alternatively use 7 ounces canned chopped tomatoes

ingredients.raw: 1 quart (960 ml) homemade chicken or vegetable stock or store-bought low-sodium chicken or vegetable broth

expected.item: homemade chicken or vegetable stock or store-bought low-sodium chicken or vegetable broth

ingredients.raw: Chopped cilantro, for garnish, if desired

expected.item: Chopped cilantro, for garnish, if desired
